title: FINALLY got the nerfs Lucian deserves
body:
Now I can stop perma-banning him when I'm first pick.

> Lightslinger (Passive) -  Damage of second shot reduced to 30/40/50% (down from 50% across all ranks) and duration decreased to 2 seconds (down from 6)

replies.body:
Lucian is one of those champions that I feel gets more %%%% than he deserves, like Yasuo or Master Yi. He's strong, that's clear, and I feel he did need some nerds a while ago. But now I feel like he's good where he is. 

Whenever I play against him, I always win, not trying to sound modest. This nerf isn't a lot, and isn't going to affect him much, but I think there has been enough nerds for the time being. Just my opinion  {{champion:236}}

While I don't feel as though Lucian is game breaking strong, this nerf will actually weaken him quite a bit, since a lot of his strength comes from him being able to win every single trade up until level 6 simply because of how his passive works. What the nerf directly works to do is reduce that early game bully, but keep his late game just as strong, which I am really happy to see.

Edit: it also means he can't do that weird bs where he Q's a minion, then like 5 seconds later he double hits you.
People actually still ban Lucian? Rofl.
